Description: Fragment of foot and bowl of black-glazed pottery bowl; glazed save for join of wall and foot outside and stand-ring of foot; interior: stamped decoration consisting of palmettes and circles; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.132)
